sentences.en: A change in membrane potential affects the orientation of charged molecules.
sentences.cn: 模电位变化影响着荷电分子的方向.

sentences.en: A vibrating membrane in the ear helps to convey sounds to the brain.
sentences.cn: 耳膜的振动帮助声音传送到大脑.

sentences.en: Active lipase is associated with the membrane of the spherosomes.
sentences.cn: 活跃的脂肪酶与圆球体的膜相结合.

sentences.en: After adherence, the particle is enveloped by cell membrane.
sentences.cn: 附着之后, 粒子被细胞膜包裹.

sentences.en: In bacterial systems transport activities are performed by membrane proteins.
sentences.cn: 在细菌系统中运输活性是通过膜蛋白实现的.

sentences.en: It consists of a stack of flat, membrane - bounded sacs.
sentences.cn: 它由一大堆扁平的膜缘清楚的囊组成.

sentences.en: Loud noise can damage the delicate membrane in the ear.
sentences.cn: 很响的噪声会损伤脆弱的耳膜。

sentences.en: Periodically , the lamellae become enlarged, forming flattened, membrane - enclosed vesicles called thylakoids.
sentences.cn: 片层周期性地扩展, 形成扁平的有膜为界的囊,称为类囊体.

sentences.en: Spores form a lipid membrane during the process of reproducing.
sentences.cn: 孢于在生殖过程中形成类脂膜.

sentences.en: The apical membrane of the epithelial cells is apparently essential.
sentences.cn: 上皮细胞的顶膜显然是必要的.

sentences.en: The endophyte is surrounded by a membrane of apparent host plant origin.
sentences.cn: 内生植物是明显地被起源于寄生植物的膜包围的.

sentences.en: The envelope is derived in most cases from the cytoplasmic membrane.
sentences.cn: 大多数病毒的囊膜取自宿主细胞膜.

sentences.en: The membrane of a bat's wing is interdigital.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠翅膀的膜是长在趾间的.

sentences.en: Then the water will pass through the membrane into the salt solution.
sentences.cn: 然后,水通过薄膜进入盐水中.

sentences.en: These are substances which specifically latch onto the protein on the cell membrane.
sentences.cn: 这些物质专门依附在细胞膜的蛋白质之上。

sentences.en: This process suffers mainly from clogging the membrane.
sentences.cn: 这种过程的主要问题是滤膜的堵塞.

phrases.tran_cn: 膜过滤；隔膜渗滤作用；膜滤法
离子交换膜法；薄膜技术；薄膜法

trans.tran_cn: （动物或植物体内的）薄膜，隔膜，（可起防水、防风等作用的）膜状物
trans.tran_en: a very thin piece of skin that covers or connects parts of your body
